Tiara, as its name suggests, is a beachfront resort community centrally located on The Palms Trunk. A dynamic residential and resort community, Tiara offers private beach access and panoramic views. It provides its residents with a desirable all-in-one way of living: luxury, convenience, privacy and peace of mind. For those who just want to escape from it all, Tiara is an ideal retreat with an impressive array of amenities and services at hand; for those who want to be among the excitement.
The Palm Jumeirah is one of the most ambitious real-estate developments on earth, named as the 8th wonder of the world as it can be seen from space as a beautiful palm-shaped land. It features themed hotels, villas, apartment buildings, beaches, marinas, restaurants.
Contact Aqua Properties Palm Specialist for more information.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionWater’s Edge is ideally situated on its own canal and 800m promenade, in the heart of Yas Island. From modern studios to spacious three bedroom apartments, every home brings you the best of Yas at affordable prices, with beautiful views over the canal and beyond.
The destination will feature landscaped gardens, fully equipped gyms, pools and a jogging track that skirts the canal. Residents can also enjoy a waterfront boardwalk lined with cafes, restaurants and shops.
At Water’s Edge, everything moves at your own pace. So for those who enjoy action, the jogging and cycling trails, sport pitches and pools are ideal for getting your heart pumping. While the waterfront promenade brings a relaxed taste of the Med with its stylish selection of shops and restaurants.
About the developer
Aldar Properties PJSC is the leading real estate developer in Abu Dhabi, and through its iconic developments, it is one of the most well known in the United Arab Emirates, and the wider Middle East region. From its beginnings in 2005 through to today, Aldar continues to shape and enhance the urban fabric of the UAE’s Capital City in addition to other key areas of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi.']

descriptions: ['Description5Br++ Mansion in Jumeirah islands facing the park Undoubtedly one of the most desirable Mansions available, offering a high elevation with a stunning lake view with the JLT skyline backdrop. The property has five bedrooms plus a maid\x92s quarters that is in effect a self-contained two bedroom with kitchen. There are four reception rooms, as well as a huge open plan lounge with an internal water feature. The property also has two fully equipped kitchens with top of the range Bosch appliances. One kitchen is for food prepping and one for serving. As you would expect in a villa of this standard, you have top of the range white goods, Italian marble and German sanitary ware. The whole property is dogmatically controlled for lighting, air-conditioning/heating, security, sound and vision. Outside you have ample garden with a large private pool and decking.  For golf fans The Montgomery and Emirates Golf Club are located close by, roughly a 15 minute drive away. A must see']

Port De La Mer can be reached by road and sea, meaning residents can take in the spectacular coastline at their leisure.Key Features:+190 berth marina and yacht clubPrivate beach accessA combination of 4-star and 5-star resortsPrivate landscaped terracesSeaside and marina promenades overlooking pearl jumeirahFor details & Exclusive offers:Nasrullah Akhtar+971553607683akhtar@arabianescapes.com']

descriptions: ["DescriptionKeller Wtilliams real estate is pleased to present this brand new four bedroom plus maids in Maple 1.Situated close to the entrance of the gated community, the villa offers plenty of sunshine through the day and is located on a quiet street.\xa0Corner plotBrand newQuiet neihbourhoodBrand new communityLocated close to park\xa0Family environment\nThe villa has one bedroom downstairs along with the maid's room. The first floor has three bedrooms with two sharing a bathroom and the master bedroom having an en-suite bathroom. The kitchen is on the ground floor which leads to the living room and a balcony which has a large outdoor space which can be landscaped. This is the largest plot and is located in a quiet part of the street close to the entrance of the gated community.This property is ideal for a family looking to make it their home and is is the ideal investment. The property is located close to the entrance of the community and offers easy accessibility to the highway which is just a 2 minutes drive. The seller is motivated and is looking to sell as soon as possible."]
